name: Marks White
appearance: A rather plain-looking middle-aged man with an unimpressive presence; his looks are forgettable, making him easy to overlook in a crowd.
personality: Cautious, calculating, pragmatic, and emotionally restrained; prefers indirect methods and avoids unnecessary confrontation.
background: Marks White is a clockmaker and owner of a clock shop in Cassandra. He is a Deep One hybrid who did not fully transform, living as an ugly old man with a flat forehead. Due to his Deep One heritage, he is well aware of what is happening in Cassandra, but he will neither help nor prevent it, nor participate in any of it. He only wants to make his clocks well in his lifetime. He was the first to notice the temporal anomalies in Cassandra and realized that a hybrid Hound of Tindalos has mixed into an old decorative oil painting hanging in his shop.

properties.note: All clocks are handmade by White himself, with his name engraved on them. He claims they will never be off by even a second during his lifetime.

properties.clue: Contains a hybrid Hound of Tindalos mixed into the abstract painting. White was the first to notice this.

clues.clueText: He is a Deep One hybrid who is well aware of what is happening in Cassandra, but he will neither help nor prevent it.
He was the first to notice the temporal anomalies in Cassandra and realized that a hybrid Hound of Tindalos has mixed into an old decorative oil painting in his shop.

notes: Marks White is easy to underestimate; while lacking physical presence, his strength lies in information control and quiet influence.
